Description: On US-13 North in the City of Virginia Beach, at Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel North, motorists can expect delays due to high wind.
Label: Weather Incident - High Wind - Advisory

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 261.2 in the City of Hampton, near Hampton Roads Center Parkway, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On Rt. 685 North in the County of Hanover, in the vicinity of Verdon Rd; Rt. 684E/W (Hanover County), motorists can expect delays due to weather. Lane closures exist.
Label: Weather Incident - Other Weather - Advisory

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 4 in the County of Greensville, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer
